name: World of Tanks - Legend Of War Pack
name_original: World of Tanks - Legend Of War Pack
description:
Are you prepared to take control of the battlefield? Help aide your fight to become the undisputed hero of war and download the Legend of War Pack. This bundle features three Premium tanks from different nations, a full week of premium time, and loads of gold to use on consumables, ammo, and more.

Bundle includes: • American Tier VI T78 Tank Destroyer • German Tier V Pz.Kpfw. T 25 Medium Tank • Soviet Tier VI Object 244 Heavy Tank • 1250 Gold • 7 Days of Premium Account

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own Garage slot plus a mix of standard and Premium ammo.
